Name: chromosomal deletion syndrome
Definition: A chromosomal disease that has_material_basis_in partial deletion of chromosomes.

Name: chromosomal duplication syndrome
Definition: A chromosomal deletion syndrome that is characterized by intellectual disability and developmental delay

Name: Edwards syndrome
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in brain

Name: Patau syndrome
Definition: A color blindness that is characterised by a selective deficiency of blue vision

Name: Down syndrome
Definition: A chromosomal disease that is characterized by flat-looking facial features and weak muscle tone (hypotonia) in infancy and is caused by trisomy of all or a critical portion of chromosome 21 and is associated with intellectual disability.

Name: Silver-Russell syndrome
Definition: An otitis interna which involves inflammation of the labyrinths.

Name: Klinefelter's syndrome
Definition: An acquired metabolic disease that has_material_basis_in an abnormally high level of uric acid in the blood.

Name: obsolete endocrine syndrome
Definition: An acquired metabolic disease that has_material_basis_in an abnormally high level of uric acid in the blood.

Name: Angelman syndrome
Definition: A chromosomal disease that is characterized by delayed development
